conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway/isometric-style render with extruded walls (height + thickness), visible floor plane, and multiple wall faces; ceiling/roof is removed to expose interior.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion and readable interior volume; clean cutaway with an angled view and minimal distortion. Minor simplification in wall detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major zones roughly correspond (living/dining left, kitchen upper-left, bedrooms right, detached garage), but several plan-defined spaces/partitions are missing or merged (balcony, entry/linen, laundry/robe, separate WC). Door/window placement and opening geometry do not reliably match the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Living/dining furniture and two beds are present and plausibly placed; kitchen blocks included. Bathroom/WC fixtures are largely absent or not distinguishable, reducing fidelity to the plan’s bath + separate WC.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is clean and readable with consistent materials and a clean background; interior visibility is good. Minor ambiguity due to simplified/omitted openings and fixtures.

detected_errors.description: Multiple plan spaces are missing or merged in 3D (e.g., balcony, entry/linen, laundry/robe, separate WC), reducing room-count and functional partition fidelity.
Doors/windows are not consistently represented on the correct walls and openings are simplified relative to the 2D plan.
Bathroom and WC fixtures are not clearly modeled; furniture/fixtures do not fully reflect the plan program.

summary: A valid and well-rendered 3D cutaway is produced, but layout fidelity is only moderate due to missing/merged rooms and weak door-window/fixture correspondence to the 2D plan.
